com.mappedin.sdk

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mappedin.sdk.Navigatable
      • com.mappedin.sdk.Polygon

  • public class Polygon
extends Navigatable

    The Polygon class represents the 3D shape of a Loction on a Map.

    A Location would have one or more polygons associated with it. For example, a Washroom Location might a have a few Polygons spread throughout the Venue for each one that exists, but a single store might just have one presence, and therefor one Polygon.
